title: modelRegistrations
description:
Model Registry component is a centralized model store, set of APIs, and UI, to collaboratively manage the full lifecycle of an Model.
It provides model lineage (which experiment and run produced the model), model versioning, stage transitions (for example from staging to product∆íion), and annotations.

registerTime.description: The date and time of model registered

updateOn.description: The date time of model registry is updated

stageVersion.description: Indicate state of the model registry

creator.description: the user who create this model registry

sourceRunId.description:
The runID of the experiment
By this runID, model metrics metadata can be retrieved from experiment
